title: If I Loved You, I Would Tell You This
description: FINALIST FOR THE FRANK O’CONNOR SHORT STORY AWARDNOW WITH AN ADDITIONAL STORY.Heralding the arrival of a stunning new voice in American fiction, If I Loved You, I Would Tell You This takes readers into the minds and hearts of people navigating the unsettling transitions that life presents to us A father struggles to forge an independent identity as his blind daughter prepares for college. A mother comes to terms with her adult daughter’s infidelity. An artist mourns the end of a romance while painting the portrait of a dying man. Brilliant, hopeful, and fearlessly honest, If I Loved You, I Would Tell You This illuminates the truths of human relationships, truths we come to recognize in these characters and in ourselves. This edition includes an excerpt from Robin Black's Life Drawing.Look for the If I Loved You, I Would Tell You This discussion guide inside.Join the Circle for author chats and more.RandomHouseReadersCircle.com
author: Robin    Black
